payload.name: Leftovers
payload.description: At the end of every turn, holder restores 1/16 of its max HP

payload.name: Rocky Helmet
payload.description: If holder is hit by a contact move, the attacker loses 1/6 of its max HP.

payload.name: Safety Goggles
payload.description: Holder is immune to powder moves and damage from Sandstorm or Hail
